description: This algorithm stitches a group of map tiles saved in a directory together. The resulting image is saved in png format with the image path and bounds saved onto the chain ledger.
name: stitch_tiles

outputs.description: Path to image that was stitched together
outputs.name: image_path

outputs.description: Array containing the leaflet bounds of stiched image extent
outputs.name: image_bounds

required_parameters.description: List of image filenames to stitch together
required_parameters.name: image_filenames
